snippet: A veterinarian writes that an understanding and appreciation of the science of equine behavior are necessary to elucidate how raceday Lasix impoverishes the medical welfare of racehorses.
abstract: A veterinarian writes that an understanding and appreciation of the science of equine behavior are necessary to elucidate how raceday Lasix impoverishes the medical welfare of racehorses.

headline.main: Essay: Medication Continues to Stifle America's Triple Crown Hopes
